arts.ttl: The lowdown on AFC Wimbledon 2 Notts County 0 - Dons reignite League Two promotion chase with win against Magpies
arts.sum: AFC Wimbledon secured their first win in their last five League Two games with a convincing 2-0 victory over promotion rivals Notts County at Plough Lane, thanks to goals from Joe Lewis and Alastair Smith. Tactical tweaks and some stern words during the break were enough for Notts County to improve considerably in the second half, dominating possession, but once again failing to produce convincing chances.

arts.ttl: Alistair Smith stunner helps AFC Wimbledon see off promotion rivals Notts County
arts.sum: Joe Lewis had fired the Dons in front.

arts.ttl: AFC Wimbledonâ€™s hit midfielder on his long-term future and savouring AFC Wimbledon promotion challenge
arts.sum: Smith returned to Lincoln, who just missed out on the League One play-offs last season, and headed out on loan again this summer. Alistair Smith says he has regained his confidence on loan at AFC Wimbledon after his first tricky season in professional football.

The biggest game in League Two this weekend as fifth placed Wimbledon face fourth placed Notts County with both sides less than four points from automatic promotion places and have a game in hand. Wi...
